short_summary: Subject matter expert for aviation fuels task group
full_summary:
===============

## Technical Expert Consultant for the Committee on Aviation Environmental Protection (CAEP) Fuels Task Group (FTG) 

The Government of Canada invites submissions for the provision of technical expertise services to support Canada's participation in the Fuels Task Group (FTG) of the Committee on Aviation Environmental Protection (CAEP). The selected consultant will provide subject matter expertise to Transport Canada Civil Aviation (TCCA) on sustainable aviation fuels and lower carbon aviation fuels.

**Tender Details**

* **Tender Reference Number**: PW-22-01006037
* **Amendment Number**: 0
* **Solicitation Number**: T8080-220093
* **Publication Date**: September 1, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 3, 2022 (14:00:00)

**Purpose of the Tender**

The selected consultant will provide technical expertise to support Canada's participation in the FTG, participating in the review and preparation of reports to reflect Canada's position on key issues related to sustainable aviation fuels and lower carbon aviation fuels. The consultant will also support the development of processes and methodologies for consideration of sustainable aviation fuels under CORSIA.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Provide subject matter expertise to Transport Canada Civil Aviation on sustainable aviation fuels and lower carbon aviation fuels
* Support Canada's participation in the Fuels Task Group of the Committee on Aviation Environmental Protection
* Participate in the review and preparation of reports to reflect Canada's position on key issues
* Support the development of processes and methodologies for consideration of sustainable aviation fuels under CORSIA

**Tender Requirements**

* A minimum of 5 years of experience in the field of sustainable aviation fuels and lower carbon aviation fuels
* A strong understanding of the Committee on Aviation Environmental Protection and its Fuels Task Group
* Excellent communication and intercultural skills

## How to Submit a Proposal

Please submit your proposal electronically to the following address: [alexander.hmaidan@tc.gc.ca](mailto:alexander.hmaidan@tc.gc.ca) by October 3, 2022 (14:00:00). For more information and to access the tender documents, please visit: [https://www.canadabuys.ca](https://www.canadabuys.ca)

**Contracting Agency**

Transport Canada Civil Aviation

Ottawa, ON K1A 0N5
